name: ARENA (itch) (closed doors)
description:
Arena is a roguelike with a crazy bullet hell boss where you either win or get totally annihalated. I wish you lots of luck and if you see the quad minigun or auto sniper, get it! They're insanely overpowered (I wish the dev would balance the game a little more, oh wait that's me!)

If there is any bugs (and there will be bugs) please copy and paste the error or write the problem in the comments and I will patch it ASAP.

WASD to move

Left click to shoot

Right click to dash

Space to switch weapons

R to reload
